channel.title: [Misc] Survivor:Adiart [Reunion, Day 39]
channel.description:
# Survivor:Adiart *Survivor, the TV Show, but on the forums!*
# Gameplay -Cycles are broken into 2 phases. Challenges and Tribal. Challenge phases are when your tribe competes in a immunity challenge to not go tribal if it’s pre-merge, or individual immunity if it’s merge.
Tribal Phases are either, free time if your tribe won immunity, or when you can A. try to organize time for a LIVE! Tribal. B. Do standard 24 hours to vote tribal
Tribal will be explained in-depth when your tribe first goes to tribal.
The hidden immunity idol is also in play, keep your eyes peeled for possible hints towards it.
At a certain point your tribes will merge and you’ll be with everyone left in the game. People booted at merge will become part of the jury, the people who decide who wins the game.
# Rules 1. NO CHEATING. IF YOU SEND A SCREENSHOT OF YOUR CON/ONE ON ONE CHAT TO SOMEONE YOUR ASS IS GRASS. MKAY 2.All deadlines are 24 hours unless stated 3.Failing to meet deadlines will get you a strike 4.No talking to people who arent on your tribe. thats a no-no and will you get booted 5.If there are any questions just ping me in your confessional
# Players 1. ~~Marshal~~ First Juror-11th 2. Hippo 3. ~~Magnus~~ Removed at 12th 4. Simon 5. PokemonKidRyan 6. ~~Gamerpoke~~ Placed 15th 7. PoisonedSquid 8. ~~KyoDaz~~-Placed 16th 9. ~~DirectorHail~~ Removed at 13th 10. Teleology 11. Jgoesgaming 12. ~~Andrej~~ Removed at 14th 13. SirDerpsALot 14. WazzaAzza 15. Issac 16. Eevee ***THIS WILL ALL BE HOSTED ON THE FORUMS***

item.title: [Misc] Survivor:Adiart [Reunion, Day 39]
item.dc:creator: Hippolytus
item.description:
It uses the basics rules of coup but has 7 roles in total to account for more ppl and each roles a bit simpler. Had to change it quite a bit so all players and roles acted simultaneously cuz obvs going in a circle is boring af on a forum.

So i rlly enjoyed this and eevees ffa, and they reminded me a while ago i designed a forum version of the bluffing game “Coup” for about 15 ppl. Would ppl be interested in playing? Ud make alliances and shit but theres also bluffing and assadsinations and voting. I made it kinda like Behind the Masks for dummies.

item.title: [Misc] Survivor:Adiart [Reunion, Day 39]
item.dc:creator: Hippolytus
item.description:
A longer premerge would result in a better post merge imo. Our post merge story was “take out minority tribe threats and majority tribe leader, have undertheradar players make it to end.” This is p common in survivor but p boring imo.

If premerge is longer i think stronger players have more time to solidify alliances and shit.

Read full topic
